column1:
Fold                          <U+2325> <U+2318> <U+2190>      option + command + left arrow
    Unfold                        <U+2325> <U+2318> <U+2192>      option + command + right arrow
    Unfold All                    <U+2325> U         option + U
    Fold Methods & Functions      <U+2325> <U+2318> <U+2191>      option + command + up arrow
    Unfold Methods & Functions    <U+2325> <U+2318> <U+2193>      option + command + down arrow
    Fold Comment Blocks           ^ <U+21E7> <U+2318> <U+2191>    control + shift + command + up
    Unfold Comment Blocks         ^ <U+21E7> <U+2318> <U+2193>    control + shift + command + down
    Focus Follows Selection       ^ <U+2325> <U+2318> F    control + option + command + F
    Fold All                      <U+2318> <U+2325> <U+21E7> <U+2190>    command + option + shift + left
    Unfold All                    <U+2318> <U+2325> <U+21E7> <U+2192>    command + option + shift + left
